knowledgePoints.description: 左极限等于右极限且都存在

knowledgePoints.description: Δy ≈ dy用于估算函数变化量

nodes.label: 第四章 中值定理与导数的应用

knowledgePoints.title: 罗尔定理
knowledgePoints.description: 闭区间连续开区间可导且端点值相等则存在导数为零的点

knowledgePoints.title: 拉格朗日中值定理
knowledgePoints.description: 平均变化率等于某点瞬时变化率

knowledgePoints.title: 中值定理的几何解释
knowledgePoints.description: 存在一点切线平行于弦

knowledgePoints.title: 0/0型未定式的洛必达法则
knowledgePoints.description: 分子分母分别求导再取极限

knowledgePoints.title: ∞/∞型未定式的洛必达法则
knowledgePoints.description: 同样适用求导方式处理

knowledgePoints.title: 洛必达法则的使用条件
knowledgePoints.description: 必须是未定式且导数极限存在

knowledgePoints.title: 导数符号与单调性的关系
knowledgePoints.description: f'>0则增，f'<0则减

knowledgePoints.title: 单调区间的划分
knowledgePoints.description: 通过导数为零的点划分区间

knowledgePoints.title: 严格单调性的判定
knowledgePoints.description: 导数非负且不恒为零

knowledgePoints.description: 局部范围内最大的函数值

knowledgePoints.title: 费马引理
knowledgePoints.description: 可导极值点处导数为零

knowledgePoints.title: 第一充分条件判别极值
knowledgePoints.description: 导数变号法判断极大极小

knowledgePoints.title: 最值的存在性
knowledgePoints.description: 闭区间连续函数必有最值

knowledgePoints.title: 最值的求法
knowledgePoints.description: 比较端点和驻点处的函数值

knowledgePoints.title: 极值的应用举例
knowledgePoints.description: 利润最大化、成本最小化等问题

knowledgePoints.title: 凹凸性的定义
knowledgePoints.description: 曲线位于切线上方或下方

knowledgePoints.title: 二阶导数与凹凸性关系
knowledgePoints.description: f''>0为凹，f''<0为凸

knowledgePoints.title: 拐点的定义与判定
knowledgePoints.description: 凹凸性改变的点，f''=0或不存在

knowledgePoints.title: 原函数的定义
knowledgePoints.description: F'(x)=f(x)，则F是f的原函数

knowledgePoints.title: 不定积分的定义
knowledgePoints.description: 所有原函数的集合，记作∫f(x)dx

knowledgePoints.title: 积分常数C的意义
knowledgePoints.description: 表示任意常数，体现原函数族

knowledgePoints.title: 积分与微分互为逆运算
knowledgePoints.description: d∫f(x)dx = f(x)dx，∫F'(x)dx = F(x)+C

knowledgePoints.title: 常数因子提至积分号外
knowledgePoints.description: ∫kf(x)dx = k∫f(x)dx

knowledgePoints.title: 积分的线性性质
knowledgePoints.description: 代数和的积分等于积分的代数和

knowledgePoints.title: 指数函数的积分
knowledgePoints.description: ∫e^x dx = e^x + C

knowledgePoints.title: 三角函数的积分
knowledgePoints.description: 如∫cos x dx = sin x + C

knowledgePoints.title: 倒数函数的积分
knowledgePoints.description: ∫1/x dx = ln|x| + C

knowledgePoints.title: 第一换元法（凑微分法）
knowledgePoints.description: 将被积表达式凑成u'du形式

knowledgePoints.title: 常见凑微分技巧
knowledgePoints.description: 如dx=d(x+a), xdx=½d(x²)

knowledgePoints.title: 第二换元法
knowledgePoints.description: 令x=φ(t)进行根式消去

knowledgePoints.title: 三角代换法
knowledgePoints.description: 处理含√(a²-x²)等形式

knowledgePoints.title: 分部积分公式
knowledgePoints.description: ∫udv = uv - ∫vdu

knowledgePoints.title: ‘反对幂三指’口诀应用
knowledgePoints.description: 选择u的优先顺序

knowledgePoints.title: 多次分部积分
knowledgePoints.description: 适用于多项式与指数/三角乘积
